head.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to extract specific pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} document and save them as a separate file.

header.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can enhance your {{EnvNameShort}} applications with powerful document processing features for {{FileFormatUp}} files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and images. It provides essential features such as merging, splitting, extracting, swapping, and removing pages.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a range of powerful features to process more than 50 widely used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple document formats
feature_1.content: Combine files like PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, Excel spreadsheets, images, and archives. Customize merging options to meet your needs.

feature_2.title: Page management
feature_2.content: Work with specific pages or page rangesâ€”move, remove, or reorder them to refine your business documents.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or change their orientation between landscape and portrait.

feature_4.title: Extract selected pages
feature_4.content: Extract only the pages you need and save them as a separate document.

formats.title: Extract pages from various document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, enabling efficient document manipulation.

examples.comment_4: Save the extracted pages as a new file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to extract pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents easily. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications by integrating advanced document management capabilities.
content.step_1: Specify the file path of the source {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Choose the pages you want to extract.
content.step_4: Save the extracted pages as a new document.

code_1.title: Extract specific pages from a document
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to extract a range of pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} document and save them as a separate file.
code_1.comment_2: Set options to extract only even-numbered pages within a range
code_1.comment_4: Save the extracted pages as a new document
